General.Name: Ebusco Holding BV
General.Description: Ebusco Holding N.V., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and distributes zero emission buses, batteries, and charging systems in the Netherlands, Belgium, France, Germany, Norway, Switzerland, and Denmark. It also sells ancillary products and services; and provides electric vehicle ecosystem repair and maintenance services. Ebusco Holding N.V. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Deurne, the Netherlands.
